roles.title: Indicates the organization that created this content.
Indicates the organization for which this content was created.
Indicates the organization responsible for all content represented in the "document".

parties.name: Customer
parties.remarks: organization to be customized at account creation only for their Component Definition

parties.name: ISV
parties.remarks: organization to be customized at ISV subscription only for their Component Definition

params.label: Method
params.usage: Select to just monitor the policy or to prevent its violation.
guidelines: The first listed value option is set by default in the system unless set-parameter is used to specify a value to satisfy a control requirements.Type CSV

params.label: AssociatedKeyService
params.usage: Select the key to encrypt the bucket. Allowed key management services are KEY PROTECT, HYPER PROTECT CRYPTO SERVICE.
guidelines: The first listed value option is set by default in the system unless set-parameter is used to satisfy a control requirements. Type CSV

params.label: endpointType
params.usage: Select the endpoints type as public, private, or direct from VPC.
guidelines: The first listed value option is set by default in the system unless set-parameter is used to satisfy a control requirements.Type CSV

params.label: authorizedIpRange
params.usage: OPTIONAL: List COS range of specific IPs
guidelines: OPTIONAL: COS range of specific IPs. Type CSV

params.label: tlsVersion
params.usage: Select TLS version. Allowed values are v1.2, v2.0
guidelines: The first listed value option is set by default in the system unless set-parameter is used to satisfy a control requirements.Type String

control-implementations.description: IBM Cloud Object Storage implemented controls for NIST 800-53. It includes assessment asset configuration for CICD (and tbd runtime SCC).

target-control-implementations.description: Toolchain implemented controls for NIST 800-53. It includes assessment asset configuration for CICD.

links.text: Schema for the Toolchain CRA summary follows the Result standard based on OSCAL Assessment Result.
links.rel: we should be using this field too

params.label: Method
params.usage: Select to just monitor the policy or to prevent its violation.
guidelines: The first listed value option is set by default in the system unless set-parameter is used to specify a value to satisfy a control requirements.

params.label: Endpoints
params.usage: Select the endpoints type as public, private, or direct from VPC.
guidelines: The first listed value option is set by default in the system unless set-parameter is used to satisfy a control requirements.

params.label: Authorized_IPs
params.usage: Specify a list of IP addresses in CIDR notation
guidelines: Specify a list of IP addresses in CIDR notation

params.label: Public_Access
params.usage: List of services assigned public  access
guidelines: COS should not be selected in the list of services assigned public access.
